CCDD

Class CcddJSONHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • CCDD.CcddImportSupportHandler
      • CCDD.CcddJSONHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CcddImportExportInterface

    public class CcddJSONHandler
extends CcddImportSupportHandler
implements CcddImportExportInterface
    CFS Command and Data Dictionary JSON handler class

      • importFromFile

        public void importFromFile(CcddClassesComponent.FileEnvVar importFile,
                           CcddImportExportInterface.ImportType importType,
                           CcddTableTypeHandler.TypeDefinition targetTypeDefn,
                           boolean ignoreErrors,
                           boolean replaceExistingMacros,
                           boolean replaceExistingGroups)
                    throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException,
                           java.io.IOException,
                           java.lang.Exception
        Build the information from the table definition(s) in the current file
        Specified by:
        importFromFile in interface CcddImportExportInterface
        Parameters:
        importFile - import file reference
        importType - ImportType.IMPORT_ALL to import the table type, data type, and macro definitions, and the data from all the table definitions; ImportType.FIRST_DATA_ONLY to load only the data for the first table defined
        targetTypeDefn - table type definition of the table in which to import the data; ignored if importing all tables
        ignoreErrors - true to ignore all errors in the import file
        replaceExistingMacros - true to replace the values for existing macros
        replaceExistingGroups - true to replace existing group definitions
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If a data is missing, extraneous, or in error in the import file
        java.io.IOException - If an import file I/O error occurs
        java.lang.Exception - If an unanticipated error occurs

      • exportToFile

        public void exportToFile(CcddClassesComponent.FileEnvVar exportFile,
                         java.lang.String[] tableNames,
                         boolean includeBuildInformation,
                         boolean replaceMacros,
                         boolean includeAllTableTypes,
                         boolean includeAllDataTypes,
                         boolean includeAllInputTypes,
                         boolean includeAllMacros,
                         boolean includeReservedMsgIDs,
                         boolean includeProjectFields,
                         boolean includeGroups,
                         boolean includeAssociations,
                         boolean includeVariablePaths,
                         CcddVariableHandler variableHandler,
                         java.lang.String[] separators,
                         java.lang.Object... extraInfo)
                  throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException,
                         java.lang.Exception
        Export the project in JSON format to the specified file
        Specified by:
        exportToFile in interface CcddImportExportInterface
        Parameters:
        exportFile - reference to the user-specified output file
        tableNames - array of table names to convert
        includeBuildInformation - true to include the CCDD version, project, host, and user information
        replaceMacros - true to replace any embedded macros with their corresponding values
        includeAllTableTypes - true to include the all table type definitions in the export file
        includeAllDataTypes - true to include the all data type definitions in the export file
        includeAllInputTypes - true to include the all user-defined input type definitions in the export file
        includeAllMacros - true to include the all macro definitions in the export file
        includeReservedMsgIDs - true to include the contents of the reserved message ID table in the export file
        includeProjectFields - true to include the project-level data field definitions in the export file
        includeGroups - true to include the groups and group data field definitions in the export file
        includeAssociations - true to include the script associations in the export file
        includeVariablePaths - true to include the variable path for each variable in a structure table, both in application format and using the user-defined separator characters
        variableHandler - variable handler class reference; null if includeVariablePaths is false
        separators - string array containing the variable path separator character(s), show/hide data types flag ('true' or 'false'), and data type/variable name separator character(s); null if includeVariablePaths is false
        extraInfo - unused
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If a file I/O or JSON JavaScript parsing error occurs
        java.lang.Exception - If an unanticipated error occurs

      • getTableData

        protected CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject getTableData(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                              boolean getDescription,
                                                              boolean replaceMacros,
                                                              boolean includeVariablePaths,
                                                              CcddVariableHandler variableHandler,
                                                              java.lang.String[] separators,
                                                              CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject outputJO)
        Get the data for the specified data table
        Parameters:
        tableName - table name and path in the format rootTable[,dataType1.variable1[,...]]. Blank to return the data for all tables
        getDescription - true to get the table description when loading the table data
        replaceMacros - true to display the macro values in place of the corresponding macro names; false to display the macro names
        includeVariablePaths - true to include a column, 'Variable Path', showing the variable path for each variable in a structure table using the user-defined separator characters
        variableHandler - variable handler class reference; null if isIncludePath is false
        separators - string array containing the variable path separator character(s), show/hide data types flag ('true' or 'false'), and data type/variable name separator character(s); null if isIncludePath is false
        outputJO - JSON object to which the data types are added
        Returns:
        The supplied JSON object, with the table data added (if any); null if the table doesn't exists or an error occurs when loading the data. Empty table cells are omitted

      • getDataFields

        protected CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject getDataFields(java.lang.String ownerName,
                                                               java.lang.String tagName,
                                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> referencedInputTypes,
                                                               CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject outputJO)
        Get the data field information for the specified owner (table, table type, or group)
        Parameters:
        ownerName - table name and path in the format rootTable[,dataType1.variable1[,...]] (if blank then every data table's data fields are returned), table type name in the format tableTypeTag:tableTypepName, or group owner in the format groupTag:groupName
        tagName - JSON tag name
        referencedInputTypes - list of user-defined input types referenced; null if this list isn't used by the caller. This list has any user-defined input types not already in the list added
        outputJO - JSON object to which the data fields are added
        Returns:
        The supplied JSON object, with the data field(s) added (if any)

      • getTableInformation

        protected CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject getTableInformation(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                                     boolean replaceMacros,
                                                                     boolean includeVariablePaths,
                                                                     CcddVariableHandler variableHandler,
                                                                     java.lang.String[] separators)
        Get the type, description, size, data, and data fields for the specified data table
        Parameters:
        tableName - table name and path in the format rootTable[,dataType1.variable1[,...]]
        replaceMacros - true to display the macro values in place of the corresponding macro names; false to display the macro names
        includeVariablePaths - true to include a column, 'Variable Path', showing the variable path for each variable in a structure table using the user-defined separator characters
        variableHandler - variable handler class reference
        separators - string array containing the variable path separator character(s), show/hide data types flag ('true' or 'false'), and data type/variable name separator character(s)
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified table information; null if the specified table doesn't exist or fails to load

      • getTableTypeDefinitions

        protected CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject getTableTypeDefinitions(java.util.List<java.lang.String> tableTypeNames,
                                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> referencedInputTypes,
                                                                         CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject outputJO)
        Add the table type definition(s) corresponding to the supplied table type name(s) to the specified JSON object. If no table type is provided, or if none are recognized, then nothing is added to the JSON object
        Parameters:
        tableTypeNames - names of the table types to add; null to include all defined table types
        referencedInputTypes - list of user-defined input types referenced; null if this list isn't used by the caller. This list has any user-defined input types not already in the list added
        outputJO - JSON object to which the data types are added
        Returns:
        The supplied JSON object, with the table type definitions added (if any)

      • getDataTypeDefinitions

        protected CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject getDataTypeDefinitions(java.util.List<java.lang.String> dataTypeNames,
                                                                        CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject outputJO)
        Add the data type definition(s) corresponding to the supplied data type name(s) to the specified JSON object. If no data type is provided, or if none are recognized, then nothing is added to the JSON object
        Parameters:
        dataTypeNames - names of the data types to add; null to include all defined data types
        outputJO - JSON object to which the data types are added
        Returns:
        The supplied JSON object, with the data type definitions added (if any)

      • getInputTypeDefinitions

        protected CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject getInputTypeDefinitions(java.util.List<java.lang.String> inputTypeNames,
                                                                         CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject outputJO)
        Add the custom input type definition(s) corresponding to the supplied input type name(s) to the specified JSON object. If no input type is provided, or if none are recognized, then nothing is added to the JSON object
        Parameters:
        inputTypeNames - names of the custom input types to add; null to include all defined custom input types
        outputJO - JSON object to which the input types are added
        Returns:
        The supplied JSON object, with the custom input type definitions added (if any)

      • getMacroDefinitions

        protected CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject getMacroDefinitions(java.util.List<java.lang.String> macroNames,
                                                                     CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject outputJO)
        Add the macro definition(s) corresponding to the supplied macro name(s) to the specified JSON object. If no macro is provided, or if none are recognized, then nothing is added to the JSON object
        Parameters:
        macroNames - names of the macros to add; null to include all defined macros
        outputJO - JSON object to which the macros are added
        Returns:
        The supplied JSON object, with the macro definitions added (if any)

        protected CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject getReservedMsgIDDefinitions(CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject outputJO)
        Add the reserved message ID definition(s)
        Parameters:
        outputJO - JSON object to which the reserved message IDs are added
        Returns:
        The supplied JSON object, with the reserved message ID definitions added (if any)

      • getVariablePaths

        protected CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject getVariablePaths(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> variablePaths,
                                                                  CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject outputJO)
        Add the variable paths
        Parameters:
        variablePaths - list containing arrays of the variable path in both application and user0defined formats
        outputJO - JSON object to which the variable paths are added
        Returns:
        The supplied JSON object, with the variable paths added (if any)

      • getMessageIDAndNames

        protected CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject getMessageIDAndNames()
        Get a JSON object containing the message ID owners, names, and values
        Returns:
        JSON object containing the message ID owners, names, and values; an empty object if no message IDs or names exist

      • getGroupDescription

        protected java.lang.String getGroupDescription(java.lang.String groupName,
                                               boolean applicationOnly,
                                               boolean includeNameTag)
                                        throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the description for the specified group or application, or all groups/applications with a description if no group name is provided
        Parameters:
        groupName - group name. If blank then every group's (application's) descriptions are returned
        applicationOnly - true if only groups that represent applications should be processed
        includeNameTag - true to include the group name and description tags
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified group's (application's) description; null if the specified group/application doesn't exist or the project has no groups/applications, or blank if the specified group/application has no description or if all groups/applications are requested but none have a description
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the group description

      • getGroupTables

        protected java.lang.String getGroupTables(java.lang.String groupName,
                                          boolean applicationOnly,
                                          boolean includeNameTag)
                                   throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the tables associated with the specified group or application, or for all groups/applications if no group name is provided
        Parameters:
        groupName - group name. If blank then every group's (application's) descriptions are returned
        applicationOnly - true if only groups that represent applications should be processed
        includeNameTag - true to include the group name item
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified group's (application's) table members; null if the specified group/application doesn't exist or the project has no groups/applications, or blank if the specified group/application has no table member or if all groups/applications are requested but none have a table member
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the group tables

      • getGroupFields

        protected java.lang.String getGroupFields(java.lang.String groupName,
                                          boolean applicationOnly,
                                          boolean includeNameTag,
                                          java.util.List<java.lang.String> referencedInputTypes)
                                   throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the data field information for the specified group or application, or for all groups/applications if no group name is provided
        Parameters:
        groupName - group name. If blank then every data table's data fields are returned
        applicationOnly - true if only groups that represent applications should be processed
        includeNameTag - true to include the group name item and data field tag
        referencedInputTypes - list of user-defined input types referenced; null if this list isn't used by the caller. This list has any user-defined input types not already in the list added
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified group's data fields; null if the group doesn't exist or if the project database contains no groups, or blank if the group contains no data fields
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the group data fields

      • getGroupInformation

        protected java.lang.String getGroupInformation(java.lang.String groupName,
                                               boolean applicationOnly,
                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> referencedInputTypes)
                                        throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
        Get the description, associated table(s), and data fields for the specified group or application
        Parameters:
        groupName - group name. If blank then every group's information is returned
        applicationOnly - true if only groups that represent applications should be processed
        referencedInputTypes - list of user-defined input types referenced; null if this list isn't used by the caller. This list has any user-defined input types not already in the list added
        Returns:
        JSON encoded string containing the specified group/application information; null if a group name is specified and the group/application doesn't exist or if no groups/applications exist in the project database
        Throws:
        CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an error occurs while parsing the group information

      • getScriptAssociations

        protected CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject getScriptAssociations(CcddClassesComponent.OrderedJSONObject outputJO)
        Add the script association(s) to the specified JSON object. If no associations exist, then nothing is added to the JSON object
        Parameters:
        outputJO - JSON object to which the script associations are added
        Returns:
        The supplied JSON object, with the script associations added (if any)
